review: difficult to get local streaming video working on it, unless you can open it in a browser, sometimes sluggish on response,  but tried it with chrome browser, youtube, amazon video, etc.. and it works well.It actually doesn't really 'broadcast' from your device though, it sends the stream link to the chromecast, and the dongel opens the link. (both plus and minus to that. )Other than having to run a power cord to it, (either usb powered, or plug in usb power adapter) it's quite what I expected, and works well.
